version_description: * Fixed the issue that this app cannot scan with some multifunction printers after the app was updated to the ver.6.3.0.

- Added compatibility with more Epson printers
- Minor bug fix

- Sharper photo print quality
- Print from your web browser using iPrint
-- To print a Web page, tap action* button on the toolbar of Safari and select the "Epson iPrint" gray icon on the bottom list.
-- When there is no "Epson iPrint" gray

[6.5.2]
- Improve Sharing function from a browser (printing web pages).
You can now operate a web page within iPrint after sharing from a browser.
- Add Anouncements function.
Now informing about the change for printing web pages.

- Changed the screen of Software License Agreement and Privacy Statement.
- 添加了更多兼容的爱普生打印机/一体机
- 修复了小错误

- Support for iPhone X screen layout
- Minor bug fixes

- Changed the screen of Software License Agreement and Privacy Statement.
- 添加了更多兼容的爱普生打印机/一体机
- 修复了小错误

* 可以在预览屏幕上轻松调整照片排列。
* 使用普通纸打印时打印质量提升。

Ver.7.0.2
* 添加了更多兼容的爱普生打印机/一体机。

Ver.7.0.0
* 可以在预览屏幕上轻松调整照片排列。
* 使用普通纸打印时打印质量提升。
・Fixed a bug that causes print quality problems when changing the print settings on some products.
